history.content:
The tech industry is a lot more than engineers and programmers. What does it mean to have a career in tech? What does it take to have a successful career in tech? Curious about working in a blockchain company, or any tips and tricks to getting recruited? Join us for a Q&A Panel with software engineers, designers and product managers at Circle! We’ll be discussing a variety of topics, from what it’s like working in different roles at a tech company, to the best way to get recruited!

 

Register here: http://bit.ly/circleqa
Date: Dec 2nd (Wednesday) 3PM PT -  4:30PM PT

Circle is a global financial technology firm that enables businesses of all sizes to harness the power of stablecoins and public blockchains for payments, commerce and financial applications worldwide. Circle's platform has supported over 100 million transactions worth tens of billions of dollars, with nearly 10 million retail customers, over a thousand businesses, while storing and securing more than $5 billion in digital currency assets. Circle is also a principal developer of USD Coin (USDC), which together with Coinbase and the Centre Consortium oversees the standards and protocol for what has become the fastest growing, regulated, fully-reserved stablecoin. USDC now stands at a $2.8 billion market cap and is adding nearly $200 million net new digital dollars in circulation every week. Today, Circle's transactional services, business accounts, and platform APIs are giving rise to a new generation of financial services and commerce applications that hold the promise of raising global economic prosperity for all through programmable internet commerce. Learn more at https://circle.com
history.subject: [EVENT TOMORROW] Advancing Your Career in Tech: A Q&A with Circle
